quotes.quote: Even against the greatest of odds, there is something in the human spirit- a magic blend of skill, faith, and valor- that can lift men from certain defeat to incredible victory.
Valor consists in the power of self recovery.
The hero is valorous because he stands up to every threat directed against his values. Heroism requires value conflict.
Courage is what it takes to stand up and speak; courage is also what it takes to sit down and listen.
Real valor consists not in being insensible to danger; but in being prompt to confront and disarm it.
True valor is like honesty; it enters into all that a man sees and does.
Valor is the soldier's adornment.
It is a brave act of valor to condemn death, but where life is more terrible than death it is then the truest valor to dare to live.
Valor grows by daring, fear by holding back.
Bravery is believing in yourself, and that thing nobody can teach you.
True valor lies between cowardice and rashness.
Valor is the contempt of death and pain.
True courage is not the brutal force of vulgar heroes, but the firm resolve of virtue and reason.
Live your life that the fear of death can never enter your heart.
For souls nobly born, valor doesn't await the passing of years.
Valor would cease to be a virtue, if there were no injustice.
A hero is someone who has given his or her life to something bigger than oneself.
Courage is not simply one of the virtues, but the form of every virtue at its testing point.
Valor is stability not of legs and arms but of courage and the soul.
Valor is abased by too much loftiness.
He who has resolved to conquer or die is seldom conquered; such noble despair perishes with difficulty.
It is held that valor is the chiefest virtue, and most dignifies the haver.
The valor that struggles is better than the weakness that endures.
True bravery is shown by performing without witness what one might be capable of doing before all the world.

When it comes time to die, be not like those whose hearts are filled with the fear of death, so when their time comes they weep and pray for a little more time to live their lives over again in a different way. Sing your death song, and die like a hero going home.
Take Chances, Make Mistakes, That's How You Grow. Pain Nourishes Your Courage. You Have To Fail In Order To Practice Being Brave.
Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear, not absence of fear.
Valor consists in the power of self-recovery, so that a man cannot have his flank turned, cannot be out-generalled, but put him where you will, he stands.
It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends.
Courage is the price that life exacts for granting peace.
